text: Naser Cheshm Azar (31 December 1950 â€“ 4 May 2018) was an Iranian pianist, composer, and arranger. Cheshm Azar was known for his vocal music (for a singer or choir), instrumental music, electronic music, and music which combines multiple genres. He was master in classical music, musical theatre, blues, folk music, jazz, and popular music. He was born in Ardabil, Iran. Naser Cheshm Azar died of a heart attack in Tehran on 4 May 2018 at the age of 68. ==References== ==Other websites== * Naser Cheshmazar dailyvideoreports.net * Nasser Cheshmazar imdb.com * .isna.ir .isna.ir (Persian Language) * .irna.ir .irna.ir (Persian Language) Category:1950 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Iranian musicians Category:Pianists Category:Iranian composers
title: Naser Cheshm Azar
